content: Pawn loans outstanding, the key driver of our business was $210 million at quarter end, a 19% year-over-year increase. Total revenue for the quarter was $234 million, up 22% due to higher sales in PSC and EBITDA was $24.6 million, up 33%. PLO ended the period at $209.5 million, up 19% on a year-over-year basis, which is our highest in EZCORPâs history. U.S. pawn EBITDA for the quarter was $33.7 million, up 43% on the prior year.
